title: CJ McCollum
description:
Portland Trail Blazers guard CJ McCollum on his election as the NBPA's President to replace Chris Paul, the future of Super Teams in the NBA, looming challenges facing league and union, Damian Lillard, Blazers' team success in his tenure, and much more. 
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
